price: Siku ya Kiyama atawatangulia watu wake na atawaingiza Motoni. Na muingio muovu ulioje huo!
arabic: يَقۡدُمُ قَوۡمَهُۥ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ فَأَوۡرَدَهُمُ ٱلنَّارَۖ وَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡوِرۡدُ ٱلۡمَوۡرُودُ
footnotes: Siku ya Kiyama Firauni atawatangulia kaumu yake kama alivyo watangulia hapa duniani, na atawaingiza Motoni wakipenda wasipende, wataingia humo wakizigugumia adhabu zake! Na uovu ulioje wa maji yanayo tokota watayo kunywa humo kutafuta kuondoa kiu; maji hayo yatakatakata matumbo yao!

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: yaqdumu qawmahu yawma al-qiyāmati fa-awradahumu al-nāra wabi'sa al-wir'du al-mawrūdu
